oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allison, Mollie A., 1883 March 08
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Mollie A. Allison, dated March 8th, 1883. Illustrates the first page of the document. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allison family
